This sets the high scores which are found in a file, and sorts them from highest score to lowest score.

This sets up the game board for the player.
showHighScores() - Method in class snakes.game.Model
This class gets the High Scores from the HighScores class and displays them in a pop-up message dialog.
showSnake(Snake) - Method in class snakes.game.Model
This method shows the snake's head in a specific direction it is heading.
showSnakeBody(Snake) - Method in class snakes.game.Model
This method takes care of the movement of the snake's body as it moves across the game board.
showSnakeGone(Snake) - Method in class snakes.game.Model
If the snake is dead or for some reason the snake needs to be taken off the game board, this method erases it.
Snake - Class in snakes.game
This class take care of everything related to the snake itself.
